name: 2alanimi
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s0, wal(s1, w1))), wal(s0, wal(s1, w2)))

stmt.origin: alanimi(s0, wal(s1, w0), wal(s1, w1), wal(s1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s0, wal(s1, w1))), wal(s0, wal(s1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(wal(s1, w0), wal(s1, w1)), wal(s1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s0, wal(s1, w1))), wal(s0, wal(s1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(wal(s1, w0), wal(s1, w1)), wal(s1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wal(s1, w0), wal(s1, w1)), wal(s1, w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s0, wal(s1, w1))), wal(s0, wal(s1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)

comment: Removes two universal quantifiers from a statement. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 24-May-2011.)
